item.title: PF pfctl cheat sheet
item.description: Pobrane z https://gist.github.com/tracphil/4353170 (źródło niedostępne) 1basic pfctl control 2== 3Related: http://www.OpenBSD.org 4Last update: Tue Dec 28, 2004 5== 6Note: 7this document is only provided as a basic overview 8for some common pfctl commands and is by no means 9a replacement for the pfctl and pf manual pages. General PFCTL Commands Polecenie Opis pfctl -d disable packet-filtering pfctl -e enable packet-filtering pfctl -q run quiet pfctl -v -v run even more verbose Loading PF Rules Polecenie Opis pfctl -f /etc/pf.
